fields.body:
Dear {{ proposal.speaker }},

The FOSS4G 2017 Workshop Committee is pleased to inform you that your workshop proposal has been accepted for the workshop session at FOSS4G Johannesburg 2017, which will be held from August 22nd to 26th 2017 at the World Conference Center in Bonn, Germany. The following is your workshop proposal that will be public:

Workshop Title:
{{ proposal.title }}

Conditions for Acceptance of the Workshop Proposal:

All instructors are required to register for the conference by July 10. 2017 to be allocated in the session. One accepted workshop qualifies for a one time 50% discount on Early Bird fee. Please be aware that Early Bird already ends on May 8. and there is no more 50% discount after that.

You will receive the discount code for the registration system and the workshop schedule with further information next week.

We appreciate your contribution and look forward to see you in Bonn in August.

Sincerely yours,
The FOSS4G 2017 Workshop Committee
fields.subject: Your Workshop for the FOSS4G 2017 has been accepted
fields.label: Workshop accepted

fields.body:
Dear {{ proposal.speaker }},

The FOSS4G 2017 Workshop Committee has reviewed the proposals and was extremely pleased by the high quality and the number of the Workshop proposals submitted for the FOSS4G 2017, which will be held from August 22nd. to 26th 2017 at the World Conference Center in Bonn, Germany.

We are sorry to inform you that the reviewers were not able to recommend your proposal for the workshop at this conference which means that your proposal has been rejected. The following is your proposal that will not be included in the Workshops:

Workshop Title:
{{ proposal.title }}

We would like to thank you for the time and effort that you devoted to the submission of your proposal as well as the interest in the FOSS4G 2017 in Bonn. Although your proposal has not been selected on this occasion, we hope you will have the opportunity to join us in Bonn and attend the Conference.

Should you have any questions, feel free to contact us at workshops@foss4g2017.org or info@foss4g2017.org

Sincerely yours,
The FOSS4G 2017 Workshop Committee
fields.subject: Your Workshop for the FOSS4G 2017 has been rejected
fields.label: Workshop rejected

fields.body:
Dear {{proposal.speaker}},

thank you for submitting a presentation proposal to FOSS4G 2017.
The Program Committee has worked very hard to decide which proposals
were the best fit for the conference and to create an exciting and
engaging program for our attendees.

Your talk

    {{proposal.title}}

has been ACCEPTED.

Details about the review process can be found at:
http://2017.foss4g.org/news-entry/abstract-review-process.html

A list of all accepted talks will be published on the FOSS4G website
on May 1st.

If you are UNABLE to attend, please let the committee know as
soon as possible, but not later than July 1st, by sending an e-mail
to program@foss4g2017.org. If you are able to attend, then there
is no need to let us know.

If you haven't registered for the conference by July 1st, expect
an e-mail from us asking you about your plans. Remember, the early
bird discount ends on May 8th, so just go ahead and register now.

Unfortunately, we are not able to offer any additional discount to
presenters. However, we've setup a travel grant program. Please
read all the details carefully before considering an application:
http://2017.foss4g.org/attending.html#travel-grants

Please look over your proposal at https://proposals.2017.foss4g.org/
again and review for grammar, typos, etc. This information will appear
on the website and in the printed program.

Thank you for you proposal and we look forward to see you in Bonn.

The FOSS4G 2017 Program Committee
fields.subject: Your talk for the FOSS4G 2017 has been accepted
fields.label: General Talk Accepted

fields.body:
Dear {{proposal.speaker}},

thank you for submitting a presentation proposal to FOSS4G 2017.
The Program Committee has worked very hard to decide which proposals
were the best fit for the conference and to create an exciting and
engaging program for our attendees.

Your talk

    {{proposal.title}}

has been DECLINED.

Details about the review process can be found at:
http://2017.foss4g.org/news-entry/abstract-review-process.html

A list of all accepted talks will be published on the FOSS4G website
on May 1st.

You're awesome. Your proposal was awesome. We just couldn't accept
them all.

Come to FOSS4G! One of the best things about FOSS4G is that it
gives attendees an opportunity to see what everyone is talking
about, what's up and coming, and most of all it's inspiring! You
are guaranteed to get more ideas for talks for you to propose at
the next FOSS4G.

We also have an area called "demo theatre" where you can briefly
present your work/projects without the need to apply for it. More
information will be available on the website soon.

Thank you for you proposal and we look forward to see you in Bonn.

The FOSS4G 2017 Program Committee
fields.subject: Your talk for the FOSS4G 2017 has been declined
fields.label: General Talk Rejected
